prod_short_desc: Help Batman™ use the Batwing to retrieve the stolen treasure back from The Penguin!
prod_long_desc:
Your child will love building this fun LEGO® DUPLO® Batwing Adventure play set and helping Batman™ retrieve the stolen treasure. There’s lots of action in this set for your little super hero: start the story off by launching the Batwing´s cannon, then push The Penguin down the slide before he escapes in his duck vehicle. Includes two DUPLO figures.
Includes two LEGO® DUPLO® figures: Batman™ and The Penguin, plus a penguin figure.
Features Batman’s Batwing with shooting cannon and The Penguin’s duck vehicle.
Build The Penguin’s duck vehicle and dodge the Batwing’s cannon!
Accessory elements include The Penguin’s umbrella, Batman’s Batarang, a slide and cannon darts.
Also includes bricks decorated as treasure as story starters for hours of play.
Help your child master basic building skills with this Easy to Build set.
LEGO® DUPLO® products are specially designed to be safe and suitable for small hands.
Combine with the LEGO® DUPLO® 10842 Batcave Challenge for even more Batman™ fun!
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 2-5.
Batwing measures over 1” high, 6” long and 5” wide.
Duck vehicle measures over 3” high, 3” long and 2” wide.
